Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Pole = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid local vPlayer
Tool.Enabled = true
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local spikePart = Instance.new("Part") spikePart.FormFactor = 3 spikePart.Size = Vector3.new(1, 2, 1) spikePart.Shape = "Block" spikePart.Name = "Spike" spikePart.CanCollide = false
local spikeMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") spikeMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=59092052" spikeMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=59801821" spikeMesh.Parent = spikePart
orbPart = Instance.new("Part") orbPart.Size = Vector3.new(0.5, 0.5, 0.5) orbPart.Transparency = 0.8 orbPart.Shape = "Ball" orbPart.FormFactor = 3 orbPart.Name ="Orb" orbPart.CanCollide = false
local orbPartMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") orbPartMesh.MeshType = "FileMesh" orbPartMesh.Name = "Mesh" orbPartMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=48423624" orbPartMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=48598142" orbPartMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.04, 0.04, 0.04) orbPartMesh.Parent = orbPart
local fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Size = 0.1 fire.Heat = 5.0 fire.Color = Color3.new(0, 139/255, 139/255) fire.Parent = orbPart
local float = Instance.new("BodyForce") float.force = Vector3.new(0.0, orbPart:GetMass() * 196.1, 0.0) float.Name = "Floating"
local orbDamage = 25 local spikeDamage = 40 local lightningDamage = 50
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil then creator = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator.Name = "creator" creator.Value = player creator.Parent = humanoid debris:AddItem(creator, 1) end end
function blow(parent, dmg, hit) if parent then if hit.Parent then humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if humanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= humanoid and myHumanoid ~= nil then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(dmg) end end end
function shootSpikes() vCharacter = Tool.Parent vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if vCharacter == nil or vPlayer == nil then return end
for i = 1, 12 do local pos = CFrame.Angles(0, i * math.pi/6, 0) * myTorso.CFrame.lookVector
local spawnPos = myTorso.Position spawnPos = spawnPos + (pos * 5.0)
spikeProjectile = spikePart:Clone() spikeProjectile.Name = "rope" spikeProjectile.CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + pos) * CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2, 0, 0) local floatForce = float:Clone() floatForce.force = Vector3.new(0, spikePart:GetMass() * 196.1, 0) floatForce.Parent = spikeProjectile spikeProjectile.Velocity = pos * 75.0 spikeProjectile.Parent = game.Workspace spikeProjectile.Touched:connect(function(hit) blow(spikeProjectile, spikeDamage, hit) end) debris:addItem(spikeProjectile, 4) end end
function shootOrb(pos) vCharacter = Tool.Parent vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if vCharacter == nil or vPlayer == nil then return end
local spawnPos = vCharacter.Torso.Position spawnPos = spawnPos + (pos * 5.0)
orbProjectile = orbPart:Clone() orbProjectile.Name = "Orb" orbProjectile.CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + pos)
floatForce = float:Clone() floatForce.Parent = orbProjectile orbProjectile.Velocity = pos * 65.0
orbProjectile.Parent = game.Workspace
orbProjectile.Touched:connect(function(hit) blow(orbProjectile, orbDamage, hit) end)
debris:addItem(orbProjectile, 4) end
function shootLightning() local AOE = Vector3.new(14, 14, 14) local tempTorsos= {} if myTorso then local parts = game.Workspace:FindPartsInRegion3(Region3.new(myTorso.Position - AOE, myTorso.Position + AOE), vCharacter, 100) for i = 1, #parts do if parts and parts[i].Parent then local character = parts[i].Parent if character:FindFirstChild("Torso") and character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") then if not tempTorsos[character.Torso] then character.Humanoid:TakeDamage(lightningDamage) tempTorsos[character.Torso] = character.Torso end end end end
for i, v in pairs(tempTorsos) do local lightningPart = Instance.new("Part") lightningPart.Name = "Lightning" lightningPart.FormFactor = 3 lightningPart.Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) lightningPart.Anchored = true
local lightningMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") lightningMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) lightningMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=65419828" lightningMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=65419395" lightningMesh.Parent = lightningPart
lightningPart.Size = Vector3.new(2, 2, (Pole.Position - v.Position).magnitude + 1) local tempCFrame = CFrame.new(Pole.Position, v.Position) lightningPart.CFrame = tempCFrame + tempCFrame:vectorToWorldSpace(Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) - lightningPart.Size/2.0) lightningMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, lightningPart.Size.Z * 1/14)
lightningPart.Parent = game.Workspace
debris:AddItem(lightningPart, 0.75) end end end
function staffUp() Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1, 0, 0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) end
function staffDown() Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, 0.848, 0.53) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1, 0, 0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, -0.53, 0.848) end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
tick()
staffDown() wait(0.1) local spell = math.random(1, 3) if spell == 1 then local target = myHumanoid.TargetPoint local lookAt = (target - myTorso.Position).unit shootOrb(lookAt) elseif spell == 2 then shootSpikes() else shootLightning() end
wait(0.2) staffUp()
wait(7.0) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) end
function onUnequipped() end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
